dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Hello, Bob. Nice to see you again.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: Hey Alice, how have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: I've been good, thanks. Just getting ready for our quest.

dialogues.speaker: Bob
dialogues.text: That's great! I can't wait to embark on this adventure with you.
